response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $12,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. To ensure this opportunity remains unique to you, I propose to sell it to you for $11,500. This is a special discount, allowing you to acquire the product at a competitive price while securing its value for your needs. I believe this deal presents a fantastic chance for both of us to benefit from this remarkable item. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 11500}
